org.openehealth.ipf.platform.camel.ihe.xds.core.converters

Class XdsRenderingUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openehealth.ipf.platform.camel.ihe.xds.core.converters.XdsRenderingUtils

  • public abstract class XdsRenderingUtils
extends Object
    Utility class for rendering of ebXML stub POJOs and simplified XDS model classes into XML.
    Author:
    Dmytro Rud
